docs.snippet: Protests turned into riots in Ferguson, Mo., Monday night after a grand jury decided not to charge Officer Darren Wilson for the death of Michael Brown....

headline.main: A Raw Scene as Ferguson Turns Violent

docs.lead_paragraph: Protests turned into riots in Ferguson, Mo., Monday night after a grand jury decided not to charge Officer Darren Wilson for the death of Michael Brown.

docs.snippet: Redolent of spice, evergreens or fire, a spate of new candles and sprays are ideal for taking to Thanksgiving dinner or a winter cocktail party....

headline.main: A Trio of New Holiday-Scented Hostess Presents

docs.abstract: Redolent of spice, evergreens or fire, a spate of new candles and sprays are ideal for taking to Thanksgiving dinner or a winter cocktail party.

docs.snippet: Juan Carlos Llorca, a veteran Associated Press journalist who covered immigration and the drug war along the U.S.-Mexico border, and whose reporting on illegal international adoptions helped prompt national reforms in Guatemala, has died at age 40...

headline.main: Longtime AP Reporter Juan Carlos Llorca Dies at 40
headline.print_headline: Longtime AP Reporter Juan Carlos Llorca Dies at 40

docs.lead_paragraph: Juan Carlos Llorca, a veteran Associated Press journalist who covered immigration and the drug war along the U.S.-Mexico border, and whose reporting on illegal international adoptions helped prompt national reforms in Guatemala, has died at age 40.

docs.snippet: President Ashraf Ghani has ordered a top-to-bottom review of the operations of Afghanistan's defense forces, including discussing the resumption of controversial night raids banned by his predecessor....

headline.main: Official: Afghan President Orders Military Review
headline.print_headline: Official: Afghan President Orders Military Review

docs.lead_paragraph: President Ashraf Ghani has ordered a top-to-bottom review of the operations of Afghanistan's defense forces, including discussing the resumption of controversial night raids banned by his predecessor.

docs.snippet: The U.S. Federal Reserve on Tuesday proposed to impose tougher capital standards on General Electric's finance unit, one of a handful of non-bank firms deemed critically important to the health of the financial system....

headline.main: U.S. Fed Plans Enhanced Capital Standards for GE Unit
headline.print_headline: U.S. Fed Plans Enhanced Capital Standards for GE Unit

docs.lead_paragraph: The U.S. Federal Reserve on Tuesday proposed to impose tougher capital standards on General Electric's finance unit, one of a handful of non-bank firms deemed critically important to the health of the financial system.

docs.snippet: An independent investigator will examine allegations of a 2012 gang rape at a University of Virginia fraternity house that was described in harrowing detail in Rolling Stone magazine, the state's attorney general said on Tuesday....

headline.main: Independent Investigator Named for Alleged UVA Frat Gang Rape
headline.print_headline: Independent Investigator Named for Alleged UVA Frat Gang Rape

docs.lead_paragraph: An independent investigator will examine allegations of a 2012 gang rape at a University of Virginia fraternity house that was described in harrowing detail in Rolling Stone magazine, the state's attorney general said on Tuesday.

docs.snippet: It was a riot everyone saw coming. For three months police and protesters had drilled separately to prepare for the worst if the grand jury decided not to indict white policeman Darren Wilson for the shooting death of black teenager Michael Brown....

headline.main: In Ferguson, a Riot Foreseen but Not Avoided
headline.print_headline: In Ferguson, a Riot Foreseen but Not Avoided

docs.lead_paragraph: It was a riot everyone saw coming. For three months police and protesters had drilled separately to prepare for the worst if the grand jury decided not to indict white policeman Darren Wilson for the shooting death of black teenager Michael Brown.

docs.snippet: New Yorkers may soon be able to identify themselves as more than one race under legislation introduced in the City Council on Tuesday....

headline.main: Bill: New Yorkers Could Identify as Multiracial
headline.print_headline: Bill: New Yorkers Could Identify as Multiracial

docs.lead_paragraph: New Yorkers may soon be able to identify themselves as more than one race under legislation introduced in the City Council on Tuesday.

docs.snippet: Polish authorities say that eight shoes that once belonged to Holocaust victims have been stolen from the former concentration camp Majdanek in Poland, now a state-run museum....

headline.main: 8 Shoes of Holocaust Victims Stolen in Poland
headline.print_headline: 8 Shoes of Holocaust Victims Stolen in Poland

docs.lead_paragraph: Polish authorities say that eight shoes that once belonged to Holocaust victims have been stolen from the former concentration camp Majdanek in Poland, now a state-run museum.
